Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: anish
Message:
feat: Add comprehensive tests for password reset and session management

- Implemented `test-real-reset-email.js` to send real password reset emails and validate the process.
- Created `test-real-world-scenario.js` to simulate user behavior when clicking reset links from emails.
- Developed `test-recovery-session.js` to test the recovery session flow after password reset requests.
- Added `test-session-fix.js` to verify session management during password resets.
- Introduced `test-session-validator-fix.js` to ensure the SessionValidator correctly handles password reset scenarios.
- Created `test-unified-subscription-flow.js` to validate the integration of fruit bowl subscriptions with existing systems.
- Implemented `test-with-fresh-token.js` to test the password reset flow with fresh tokens.
- Added `validate-sql-migration.js` to validate SQL migration scripts for idempotency and structure.

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: anish
Message:
feat: Implement password reset flow and related API endpoints

- Added password reset tokens table with creation logic in /api/test/password-reset-table.
- Created password reset test endpoint to generate and send reset links in /api/test/password-reset.
- Implemented signup duplicate check and welcome email logic in /api/test/signup-duplicate.
- Developed signup flow testing endpoint to validate password reset and welcome email processes in /api/test/signup-flow.
- Added welcome email testing endpoint in /api/test/welcome-email.
- Enhanced user authentication success handling in /app/auth/success/page.tsx.
- Created a debug page for password reset functionality in /app/debug/password-reset/page.tsx.
- Introduced Google Sign-In button component for user authentication in /components/auth/GoogleSignInButton.tsx.
- Developed auth email service for sending various email types in /lib/auth-email-service.ts.
- Implemented Google OAuth service for custom authentication in /lib/google-auth-service.ts.

Description: Uncovered a JSON Web Token, which may lead to unauthorized access to web applications and sensitive user data.
Author: anish
Message: feat: Update subscription duration validation and constraints to allow 1-12 months

Description: Uncovered a JSON Web Token, which may lead to unauthorized access to web applications and sensitive user data.
Author: anish
Message: feat: Update subscription duration validation and constraints to allow 1-12 months

Description: Discovered a potential authorization token provided in a curl command header, which could compromise the curl accessed resource.
Match:
curl -X POST /api/subscriptions/delivery-management \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"subscriptionId": "uuid", "userId": "uuid", "action": "get_schedule"}'

# Test cron scheduler
curl -X POST /api/cron/delivery-scheduler \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer your_cron_secret"
Author: anish
Message:
Implement delivery scheduling and management features

- Add a cron job for delivery scheduling in Netlify functions.
- Create SQL functions for cleaning up duplicate deliveries and generating delivery schedules.
- Implement API routes for managing delivery schedules, including generating, updating, and fixing delivery dates.
- Develop a React component for displaying delivery schedules with proper formatting and status indicators.
- Add a test script to verify the alternate day delivery schedule and monthly schedule generation.

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: anish
Message:
feat: Implement admin reports page with download and email functionality

- Added AdminReportsPage component for generating and managing subscription reports.
- Implemented download report feature using ExcelJS and Supabase to fetch subscription data.
- Created API endpoint for downloading reports and sending them via email.
- Added automated daily report generation and email delivery functionality.
- Implemented email notifications for subscription pause and reactivation events.
- Added test endpoints for verifying admin download and daily report functionalities.
